CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 11, 1966, reads: "NAACP PICKETS U. S. STEEL MAIN HEADQUARTERS - As as the national, state and local levels of the NAACP picketed U.S. Steel Corp.'s main headquarters building at Fifth Avenue and William Penn Way, Downtown, Monday, Deacon Ed Robinson, 81 of Olivet Baptist Church, one of the local civil rights groups' most ardent demonstrators".
TitMainTitle: NAACP picketer Deacon Ed Robinson wearing placard reading "We Protest Discriminatory Seniority Units at U. S. Steel," protesting at United States Steel Headquarters, Grant Street, Downtown
